xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This is a library module offering the same set of functions defined by Microsoft Excel, under Engineering Functions.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Sorin Nasoi

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Import excel-text module functions.
Import excel-math module functions.
Tests if a string is a hexadecimal representation of a number.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: True if the passed $arg is a hexadecimal number, false otherwise.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:is-hex
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %private function excel-engineering:is-hex($arg as xs:string) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Tests if a string is a octal representation of a number.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: True if the passed $arg is a octal number, false otherwise.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:is-oct
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %private function excel-engineering:is-oct($arg as xs:string) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Tests if a string is a binary representation of a number.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: True if the passed $arg is a binary number, false otherwise.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:is-bin
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %private function excel-engineering:is-bin($arg as xs:string) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns a binary representation of a number.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A binary representation of a number.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $number is not numeric.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:dec2hexUtil
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %private function excel-engineering:dec2hexUtil($number as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns an octal representation of a number.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: An octal representation of a number.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $number is not numeric.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:dec2octUtil
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %private function excel-engineering:dec2octUtil($number as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns a binary representation of a number.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A binary representation of a number.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $number is not numeric.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:dec2binUtil
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %private function excel-engineering:dec2binUtil($arg as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns a decimal representation of a number given it's hexadecimal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A decimal representation of a number given it's hexadecimal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided $arg is not a hexadecimal representation of a number.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:hex2decUtil
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %private function excel-engineering:hex2decUtil($arg as xs:string) as xs:integer*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns a decimal representation of a number given it's octal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A decimal representation of a number given it's octal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided $arg is not an octal representation of a number.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:oct2decUtil
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %private function excel-engineering:oct2decUtil($arg as xs:string) as xs:integer

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns a decimal representation of a number given it's binary representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A decimal representation of a number given it's binary representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided $arg is not an binary representation of a number.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:bin2decUtil
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %private function excel-engineering:bin2decUtil($arg as xs:string) as xs:integer

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts a decimal number to hexadecimal.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A hexadecimal representation of a number given it's decimal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not numeric.
excel-err:Num if provided value for $arg is smaller than -549755813888 or bigger than 549755813887

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:dec2hex
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-engineering:dec2hex($arg as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts a decimal number to hexadecimal.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $places is the number of characters to use. Places is useful for padding the return value with leading 0s (zeros).
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A hexadecimal representation of a number given it's decimal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not numeric.
excel-err:Value if provided value for $places is not numeric.
excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is zero or negative.
excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is too small.
excel-err:Num if provided value for $arg is smaller than -549755813888 or bigger than 549755813887.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:dec2hex
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-engineering:dec2hex($arg as xs:anyAtomicType, $places as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts a decimal number to octal.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: An octal representation of a number given it's decimal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not numeric.
excel-err:Num if provided value for $arg is smaller than -536870912 or bigger than 536870911.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:dec2oct
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-engineering:dec2oct($arg as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts a decimal number to octal.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $places is the number of characters to use. Places is useful for padding the return value with leading 0s (zeros).
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: An octal representation of a number given it's decimal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not numeric
excel-err:Value if provided value for $places is not numeric
excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is zero or negative
excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is too small
excel-err:Num if provided value for $arg is smaller than -536870912 or bigger than 536870911

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:dec2oct
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-engineering:dec2oct($arg as xs:anyAtomicType, $places as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts a decimal number to binary.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A binary representation of a number given it's decimal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not numeric.
excel-err:Num if provided value for $arg is smaller than -512 or bigger than 511.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:dec2bin
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-engineering:dec2bin($arg as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts a decimal number to binary.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $places is the number of characters to use. Places is useful for padding the return value with leading 0s (zeros).
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A binary representation of a number given it's decimal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not numeric.
excel-err:Value if provided value for $places is not numeric.
excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is zero or negative.
excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is too small.
excel-err:Num if provided value for $arg is smaller than -512 or bigger than 511.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:dec2bin
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-engineering:dec2bin($arg as xs:anyAtomicType, $places as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts an octal number to binary.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A binary representation of a number given it's octal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not an octal representation of a number.
excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg contains more than 10 characters.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:oct2bin
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-engineering:oct2bin($arg as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts an octal number to binary.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $places is the number of characters to use. Places is useful for padding the return value with leading 0s (zeros).
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A binary representation of a number given it's octal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not an octal representation of a number.
excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg contains more than 10 characters.
excel-err:Value if provided value for $places is not numeric.
excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is zero or negative.
excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is too small.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:oct2bin
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-engineering:oct2bin($arg as xs:anyAtomicType, $places as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts an octal number to decimal.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A decimal representation of a number given it's octal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not an octal representation of a number.
excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg contains more than 10 characters.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:oct2dec
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-engineering:oct2dec($arg as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:integer

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts a binary number to decimal.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A decimal representation of a number given it's binary representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not a binary representation of a number.
excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg contains more than 10 characters.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:bin2dec
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-engineering:bin2dec($arg as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:integer

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts an octal number to hexadecimal.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A hexadecimal representation of a number given it's octal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not an octal representation of a number.
excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg contains more than 10 characters.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:oct2hex
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-engineering:oct2hex($arg as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts an octal number to hexadecimal.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $places is the number of characters to use. Places is useful for padding the return value with leading 0s (zeros).
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A hexadecimal representation of a number given it's octal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not an octal representation of a number.
excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg contains more than 10 characters.
excel-err:Value if provided value for $places is not numeric.
excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is zero or negative.
excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is too small.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:oct2hex
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-engineering:oct2hex($arg as xs:anyAtomicType, $places as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts a hexadecimal number to binary.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A binary representation of a number given it's hexadecimal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not a hexadecimal representation of a number.
excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg contains more than 10 characters.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:hex2bin
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-engineering:hex2bin($arg as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts a hexadecimal number to binary.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $places is the number of characters to use. Places is useful for padding the return value with leading 0s (zeros).
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A binary representation of a number given it's hexadecimal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not a hexadecimal representation of a number.
excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg contains more than 10 characters.
excel-err:Value if provided value for $places is not numeric.
excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is zero or negative.
excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is too small.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:hex2bin
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-engineering:hex2bin($arg as xs:anyAtomicType, $places as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts a hexadecimal number to octal.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A octal representation of a number given it's hexadecimal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not a hexadecimal representation of a number.
excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg contains more than 10 characters.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:hex2oct
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-engineering:hex2oct($arg as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts a hexadecimal number to octal.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $places is the number of characters to use. Places is useful for padding the return value with leading 0s (zeros).
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A octal representation of a number given it's hexadecimal representation.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not a hexadecimal representation of a number.
excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg contains more than 10 characters.
excel-err:Value if provided value for $places is not numeric.
excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is zero or negative.
excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is too small.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel-engineering:hex2oct
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel-engineering:hex2oct($arg as xs:anyAtomicType, $places as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A decimal representation of a number given it's hexadecimal representation.
